---
title: Publications
permalink: /publications/

Publications listed here include work conducted under various academic, industrial, and national research programs. AIMEX Lab represents the current research direction and coordination hub. 
Publications are sorted by year (descending). First-author papers are highlighted.

---

## 2026

- **Big Data mining on Galena geochemistry using machine learning algorithms: Implications for Metallogenic Discrimination** — *Mathematical Geosciences* **[First-author]** · *Accepted; IF: 3.6*
- **Artificial Intelligence-Driven Metallogenic Typing of Pyrite from Global Ore Systems** — *Journal of Geochemical Exploration* **[First-author]** · *Accepted, IF: 3.3*
